page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: Our school has a large playground that has a big grassed area on which parents have built an adventure play-ground for us so that we can makeup our own games eg Space Travel, Horse Riding,Houses etc. Roller boots are very fashionable just now with girls. These are roller skates attached to boots. We skate on the smooth part of the playground and in the bicycle shed. Girls of all ages like to roller skate. We play many other games according to our age. The little ones like to play with dolls as babies. Tig is very popular with both boys and girls but most boys of all ages like to play football. The older boys are allowed to go down to the sports field when the weather is suitable.
